page.title: 09Transport: Rural Comunities
page.content: Penrith has a Truck Stop which has encouraged lory drivers to break their journey north. The town has tried to provide more car parking facilities, and an around the town bus service for a fixed fare. All this is very good if you live in the town or a lorry driver, but if you live out of town and do not have a car, or can not drive,and live in the courntry side things are difficult. the bus service to the rural areas are few and far between. for some areas the school bus is the only bus into town in the morning, thre might be anothe during the day, but to get back home at night the last bus leaves town at 5.30. This makes people who have no other means of transport feel very neglicted.
